text: @GavinNewsom COVID-19 will be here for the rest of our lives idiot. you keep destroying our economy! no one can afford the hospital bills and health insurance when we get it. Stop closing businesses! Unless your goal is to ruin our lives like you did when you bankrupted businesses in Calif!
